steps: step 2: Login at https://testops.staging.katalon.com/login --> navigate to Page_home
step 3: At Page_home click on hyperlink_team_project_executions --> navigate to Page_executions
step 4: At Page_executions click on hyperlink_menu_reports
step 5: At Page_executions click on hyperlink_dashboard --> navigate to Page_project
step 6: At Page_project click on hyperlink_planning --> navigate to Page_releases
step 7: Add visual checkpoint at Page_releases
